info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Luzerne County through 430 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ricketts Glen State Park, or 17 miles north of Berwick, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilkes-Barre, Muhlenberg, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plymouth, Edwardsville, Larksville, Lehman, Slocum and Sugar Notch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
